Package com.example.Bank.Services.Imp

Class InterTransferServiceImp

java.lang.Object
com.example.Bank.Services.Imp.InterTransferServiceImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransferService
@Service public class InterTransferServiceImp extends Object implements TransferService
Service implementation for performing inter-account transfers.

This class implements the TransferService interface and provides a method for transferring funds between accounts.

Usage: Implement this class to handle inter-account transfers.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Pedro Pereira

  • Method Details

    • Transfer

      public TransactionResponse Transfer(String contractNumber, TransferRequest transferRequest)
      Transfers funds from one account to another.
      Specified by:
      Transfer in interface TransferService
      Parameters:
      contractNumber - The contract number of the source account.
      transferRequest - The request containing transfer details.
      Returns:
      The transaction response representing the transfer transaction.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessError - if the source or destination account does not exist, or if the balance in the source account is insufficient.
